rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc

sentences.english: The advantages of iron ore-coal pellets covered with iron-concentrate shell are discussed.

sentences.english: Like many other blue diamonds, the rock comes from the Cullinan mine in South Africa.

sentences.english: Experiment is done on the acid hydrolysis of titanium-columbite-tantalite ore difficult to decompose.

sentences.english: It is coarse ores sediment in cyanide leaching tank and cause much lose of gold.

sentences.english: Thermal insulation pipe section made from mineral wool can be used for thermal insulation in small to medium sized pipe.
